summary: A W.I.P. preview of my Re-texturing/detailing & replacing of Skyrim\'s Dungeons texture sets
descriptionHtml:
Re-Definded Dungeons 

As of 09/02/2012

Version 1.0 core Dungeon files replacement package is a combo or all WIP packages released sofar and inc\'s a few new & tweaked textures yet not inc in previous base and ex WIP packages released sofar,use this main package as a replacement for all older packages 

These textures/normal maps are remade at a max res of 2048x2048 and should not effect performance of your game aslong as you have the Vram space for them plz see the readme here at nexus for a list of the files replaced by this mod

1.0 now takes care of pretty much all (but 1) textures in the main textures\\dungeon folder
I hope to move on to the markarth/dwemer ruins sets next!

i will update the screenshots for this mod this coming weekend and try to inc comparison shots of the Default/Beth HD/RDD side by side

Files are packaged to to include there folder paths so just extract to the root dir of your skyrim install,if you have other texture mods that replace Dungeons texture file either backup & then restore them or chose not to overwrite those files during extraction. 

Laters
Gizmo
author: Gizmo
